sentences.sContent: a historic meeting of world leaders
sentences.sCn: 具有历史意义的世界领导人会议

sentences.sContent: ‘It is a historic moment ,’ he told journalists.
sentences.sCn: “那是历史性的一刻。”他告诉新闻记者。

sentences.sContent: ...there are a lot of cultural relics and historic sites...
...the brilliant historic culture of the Central Avenue can widen people’s vision and enhance their knowledge...
